label: Space Exploration
description: Sci-Fi Novels where a major theme is exploring space and new planets.

list.label: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, by Douglas Adams
The Long Way to a Small, Angry Planet, by Becky Chambers
2010: Odyssey Two, by Arthur C. Clarke
Sixteenth Watch, by Myke Cole
Bitch Planet. Book one, Extraordinary Machine, by Kelly Sue DeConnick
The Disasters, by M. K. England
Code to Zero, by Ken Follett
The Light Years, by R. W. W. Greene
The Wanderers, by Meg Howrey
The Vanished Birds, by Simon Jimenez
Aurora Rising, by Amie Kaufman
The Dispossessed: An Ambiguous Utopia, by Ursula K. Le Guin
The Three-Body Problem, by Cixin Liu
The Mote in God's Eye, by Larry Niven
Binti: Home, by Nnedi Okorafor
To Sleep in a Sea of Stars, by Christopher Paolini
Alone Out Here, by Riley Redgate
Revelation Space, by Alastair Reynolds
Red Moon, by Kim Stanley Robinson
Red Mars, by Kim Stanley Robinson
Empire of Silence, by Christopher Ruocchio
Coyote: A Novel of Interstellar Exploration, by Allen M. Steele
Anathem, by Neal Stephenson
We are Legion: (We are Bob), by Dennis E. Taylor
Children of Time, by Adrian Tchaikovsky
Project Hail Mary: A Novel, by Andy Weir
